version_description:
We update My Vodafone on a regular basis and add more features to make your experience even better!

Grab the latest version for all of the improvements!

Now you can authenticate and access your account even if you're connected to a Roaming Network.

Of course, bug fixes under the hood to make sure that our app is as stable as possible.

If you like our app, please take a minute to rate it and give us your feedback. :-)
Support of Connect Customers and general stability fixes that make our app faster
Bug fixes related to Bill Payment and Recharges

OK, time for an update (finally) ! Well, you won’t actually see a lot of visual changes since most of them are under the hood.

• We spent quite some time for lots of bug fixes and improvements to make My Vodafone better, faster and more reliable
• We now support some new Data and Recharge bundles
• iOS 10 is just around the corner so our app is ready for it. Bring it on!
• We added a version checker just to make sure that you have the most recent update from us to enjoy all the improvements, fixes and new cool features.

Keep enjoying our app and of course don’t forget to rate us in App Store!
Live Chat iOS 10 compatibility and minor fixes

Time for an update! We worked hard adding new cool features and making the app even faster and more reliable:

• You can now manage your Extras, Offers and Internet bundles (Consumer customers)
• Grab New Happy offers specially for you, everyday (Prepaid customers)
• You can see your plan’s name on the main menu
• We added a handy tutorial with key features of the app
• Small bug fixes under the hood

Keep enjoying My Vodafone and don’t forget to rate us on App Store!

Time for a small update:
• Push notifications will inform you about latest news
• Small bug fixes

Keep enjoying My Vodafone and don’t forget to rate us on App Store!

Time for an update! We worked hard adding new cool features and making the app even faster and more reliable:

• Grab New Happy offers specially for you, everyday (Prepaid customers)
• Brand New Ask Hani Page
• Small bug fixes under the hood

Keep enjoying My Vodafone and don’t forget to rate us on iTunes!

Time for an update! We worked hard adding new cool features and making the app even faster and more reliable:

• New Ask Hani Page
• Small bug fixes under the hood

Keep enjoying My Vodafone and don’t forget to rate us on iTunes!

Time for an update!
We worked hard adding new cool features and making the app even faster and more reliable. We also fixed some Small bugs under the hood.
What's new?
- If you are in WiFi for the first time login, you can use SMS code to login

Keep enjoying My Vodafone and don’t forget to rate us on iTunes.

Time for a whole new My Vodafone app experience!
We worked hard to bring you the best world class My Vodafone app design, with new cool features, making the app even faster and more reliable.

What's new?
- A new world class easy to use design
- Faster app
- Quick recharges and payments
- Bill breakdown for postpaid customers
- Chat with our agents 24/7 in case you need support.

Keep enjoying My Vodafone and don’t forget to rate us on iTunes.

Time for a whole new My Vodafone app experience!
We worked hard to bring you the best world class My Vodafone app design, with new cool features, making the app even faster and more reliable.

What's new?

- Faster app
- Quick recharges and payments
- Bill breakdown for postpaid customers
- Chat with our agents 24/7 in case you need support.

Keep enjoying My Vodafone and don’t forget to rate us on iTunes.

Time for an update!

Unable to pay Bill or make a Recharge by Debit Card?
We worked hard to make it possible!
Now you can pay your Bill or Recharge by Local Debit Cards as well as Credit Cards!

What's new?
- A new world class easy to use design
- Faster app
- Quick recharges and payments by Credit Card and Local Debit Card
- Bill breakdown for postpaid customers
- Chat with our agents 24/7 in case you need support.

Keep enjoying My Vodafone and don’t forget to rate us on iTunes.

Time for an Update!
1. New Entry screen
2. Some exciting offers
3. Faster app

Time for an Update!
1. Faster App
2. More exciting offers and surprise offers
3. Select your image in home page
4. You can now log out and log-in with different numbers

A complete new Look!
With Secured Login, more offers, better user interface and many more!

To make our app better for you, we bring this update with improvements such as
- Fix on eSim swap
- Fix on recharge value
- Crash Fixes
- Bug fixes
- Fixed an issue where some payments were not successful

- Performance improvement and bug fixes
- Fixed an issue on chat where typed message was not shown while typing
- Enhancement in Fingerprint/FaceID
- Fixed an issue where Active Add-on/Extras were not displaying
- Fixed issue for Login for Broadband line
- Fixed an issue for Retrieve Bill, where Alphanumeric input was not displayed
